sentences.en: Conceit comes from shallowness; arrogance is due to ignorance.
sentences.cn: 骄傲来自浅薄, 狂妄出于无知.

sentences.en: He speaks in a disordered manner , which betrays his shallowness and ignorance.
sentences.cn: 这个人谈话颠三倒四,看得出他知识谫陋.

sentences.en: Take into account the shallowness at that end of the pool before you dive.
sentences.cn: 在潜水之前,注意池塘尽头的水浅.

sentences.en: The other one is thinking of the shallowness of cause manic and academic divisions.
sentences.cn: 另一种是思想的狂躁和学术的浅薄导致的分裂.

sentences.en: The water is so pinched with shallowness it is difficult for the boats to get by.
